title: AI Integrated Car
description: An autonomous vehicle featuring intelligent navigation and a fully interactive system capable of effective obstacle avoidance in complex environments.

title: Fixed Wing Plane
description: A custom-designed fixed-wing aircraft optimized for aerodynamic efficiency and stable flight dynamics.

title: Hexacopter
description: A robust hexacopter platform designed for high stability and heavy payload capacity, featuring a six-rotor configuration.

title: Humanoid Robot
shortDesc: Advanced humanoid robot with servo control.
description: A complex humanoid robot build capable of bipedal locomotion and arm gestures, powered by high-torque servos.

title: Gyro Mouse
shortDesc: Mouse input device controlled by gyroscope.
description: An innovative input device that uses a gyroscope to control the mouse cursor, allowing for intuitive hand-movement based interaction.

title: Aerial Drone Development
description: Flagship Project: Developing a powerful proprietary flight controller capable of controlling any drone with fully autonomous AI-driven navigation.

title: AI Voice Assistant
shortDesc: Next-gen AI assistant with voice, image, and 3D capabilities.
description: A cutting-edge AI assistant capable of generating PPTs, images, and 3D models. It handles natural language chatting, web searching, and automation tasks like playing songs, redefining personal assistance.

title: 6 Legged Mars Rover
shortDesc: Bluetooth-controlled hexapod robot powered by Arduino.
description: A 6-legged Mars rover prototype controlled remotely via Bluetooth and powered by Arduino. A complex mechanical build demonstrating advanced locomotion control.

title: Alexa on Raspberry Pi
shortDesc: Custom Alexa voice assistant integration on RPi.
description: Bringing Amazon Alexa to the Raspberry Pi for a custom smart home voice assistant experience.

title: Gesture Control Drone
description: A flying robot (UAV) remotely controlled by hand gestures. Working in conjunction with onboard sensors and GPS for stability and navigation.

title: Mud Skipper Bio-Robot
shortDesc: Biological robot mimicking a mud skipper.
description: A bio-inspired robot that mimics the first land-walking animal. This robot demonstrates the importance of fins and tails for the movement of these amphibious creatures.

title: IoT IR Thermometer
shortDesc: Contactless temperature sensor with high accuracy.
description: An infrared thermometer with a range of 0-99°C, functioning effectively at a 1-meter distance with only 0.02°C error.
